data.decision: Builder's Compass: Verification Intelligence is the highest-ROI skill domain for the AI age
data.rationale: Four-lens strategic analysis: (1) ROI - verification is the new bottleneck as AI generates more, every verified output = trust earned; (2) Future-proof - generation gets commoditized, verification stays hard; (3) Enriching - forces deep understanding of what "good" looks like, learning by critique; (4) Values-aligned - local standards, actual execution, compounds knowledge. Second domain: Skill Composition/Meta-Learning - "The most powerful skill is the skill that creates and combines skills."
alternatives: Focus on single-use skills (rejected: doesn't compound)
data.context: Strategic conversation about what skills to build as a builder in the AI age. Core thesis: "As AI generates more, the skill to verify becomes more valuable than the skill to generate." The builders who matter won't be those who can generate the most - they'll be those who can verify what's true, compose what's useful, and remember what's learned.
